Uses of EventBus in com.mvp4g.client.event
 

Classes in com.mvp4g.client.event with type parameters of type EventBus
 class BaseEventHandler<E extends EventBus>
          Default implementation of EventHandlerInterface.

This implementation has an event bus attribute.
You should extend this class to create a presenter.
 interface EventFilter<E extends EventBus>
          This interface can be implemented in order to receive events all events from an EventBus.

Classes that implement this interface are associated with an EventBus class by adding the
filter class literal to the filterClasses list in the EventBus' @Events annotation
 interface EventHandlerInterface<E extends EventBus>
          Interface that defines an event handler.

This interface provides getter and setter for the event bus.

It is recommended to use directly BaseEventHandler.
 

Subinterfaces of EventBus in com.mvp4g.client.event
 interface EventBusWithLookup
          Event bus where events can be fired thanks to their name.
 

Classes in com.mvp4g.client.event that implement EventBus
 class BaseEventBus
          Base implementation of the event bus.
 class BaseEventBusWithLookUp
          Abstract implementation of EventBusWithLookup.

          Interface that defines methods to convert a token from/to an event.

Uses of EventBus in com.mvp4g.client.presenter
 

Classes in com.mvp4g.client.presenter with type parameters of type EventBus
 class BasePresenter<V,E extends EventBus>
          Default implementation of PresenterInterface.

This implementation has two attribute: an event bus a view You should extend this class to create a presenter.
 class CyclePresenter<V extends CycleView,E extends EventBus>
          Presenter that receives from its view a LoadEvent when the view is attached to the DOM and a UnloadEvent when the view is detached to the DOM.
 class LazyPresenter<V extends LazyView,E extends EventBus>
          Special type of presenter that will be built only when it handles its first event.
 interface PresenterInterface<V,E extends EventBus>
          Interface that defines a presenter.

This interface provides getter and setter for a view and an event bus.

It is recommended to use directly BasePresenter.
